name: Subway 3D New York Simulator
description:
Metro 3D Simulator New York - a life simulator subway train driver!
Always wanted to try himself as a subway train driver?
Enjoy high-speed and high-speed trains on the tracks and under the ground?
The big responsibility to carry passengers and cargo from stop to stop!
It is necessary to very carefully to accelerate and brake, that would not harm the people in the car!
The New York subway is very large and a large traffic of trains!
Control the train in the first person from the cab driver!
Gently turns electric composition directly on your phone!
People need your help!
They dream must be late to work, school, college, shop or for other important matters!
Your task is to deliver them as quickly as possible and accurately!
Metro - is the quickest form of transport in the tunnel there is not much traffic and traffic jams!
Play the best simulator metro New York for free! And without an internet connection!
ATTENTION! The game was created for fun and jokes! The app does not bear any harm!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your comments and ratings as well, we will make our game even better for you!
